newsitem.title: USA: IMM currencies end mixed, yen and marks close lower.
newsitem.headline: IMM currencies end mixed, yen and marks close lower.

text.p: Feb 19 - IMM currency futures ended mixed, with yen and marks closing lower. The death of China's leader Deng Xiaoping had little affect on the market. Some analysts said marks and yen could gravitate slightly higher in the near term, as the dollar needs to consolidate at lower levels before rallying. ((DerivativesDesk(312)408-8750/E-mail:derivatives@reuters.com))
